abstract: Deepening the News Corporation‘s extensive presence in Indian media, the chairman, Rupert Murdoch, announced on Monday that the company would invest $100 million in six new regional television channels there, and he introduced a new Dow Jones index to track the
lead_paragraph: Deepening the News Corporation‘s extensive presence in Indian media, the chairman, Rupert Murdoch, announced on Monday that the company would invest $100 million in six new regional television channels there, and he introduced a new Dow Jones index to track the

headline.main: Six New TV Channels in India to Increase Murdoch’s Profile
